title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 14.4 - Appeal decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 14.4 - Appeal decision

State Regulations

The Empire Zone Designation Board will issue a decision and
serve a copy on the business enterprise or its
representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
14.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
